cause.description:
In celebration of World Food Day (October 16th), Global Volunteer Network Foundation invites you to join our annual fundraiser ‘Eat So They Can.’ The event is an international campaign that will take place on 16-17 October 2010 and it invites people from all around the world to participate in what will collectively be one huge dinner party, where something as simple as sharing a meal with friends can help to end poverty.
This meal will be special not only because it’s a great chance to entertain and spend time with your friends but also because it’s a chance to discuss issues facing the women and children around the world, to pledge to take action, and to fundraise!
Sign up as a host - www.eatsotheycan.org
1. To stop child poverty
2. To empower women
3. To provide emergency relief
4. To end child-trafficking
cause.mission: To improve the lives of women and children around the world
cause.name: Eat So They Can!
